price: 2. ir tu pamatysi žmones, priimančius Allaho religiją miniomis,
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
